headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Adversary Modes
content:
If the new Freemode Events haven’t sated your desire for destruction, try out this pair of new Adversary Modes that unlock once you reach Rank 12:

- Cross the Line – Apply tactics and firepower to get your entire team across the enemy line at once and claim victory.

- Hunting Pack – An explosive-laden vehicle is speeding through the city. One team fights to keep it moving, while the other tries to slow it down. If the vehicle's speed drops too much, the consequences will be dire.
